meanings.sent1: I arrived early for the preinterview briefing.
meanings.sent2: We discussed the job requirements preinterview.
meanings.sent3: The preinterview nerves made me forget my own name!
meanings.sent4: Being early for the preinterview was like having a head start in a race.
meanings.sent5: The preinterview checklist helped me feel more confident.

meanings.sent1: She likes to preinterview potential candidates before the actual interview.
meanings.sent2: I need to preinterview the candidates to ensure they are a good fit.
meanings.sent3: He decided to preinterview himself in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Preinterviewing is like studying before a test.
meanings.sent5: The team preinterviewed extensively to make sure they were ready.
